Race.SpecificTitle: Chief of Police -- Town of Campti

Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Proposition
(Millage Rededication)

Summary:  Rededication for the years 2010 through 2017 of a 3-mill health unit millage for the following purposes:  constructing, maintaining and operating public health units in the Natchitoches Parish and paying other general fund expenditures of the Natchitoches Parish Police Jury, including authority for said Police Jury to rededicate and expend up to $300,000 of unexpended revenues of health unit millages approved at an election held on July 21, 2007 for general fund expenditures of said Police Jury.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Natchitoches, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), be authorized to rededicate the annual revenues of the years 2010 through 2017, inclusive, of a special ad valorem tax of three (3) mills (said tax having been previously authorized for the purpose of constructing, maintaining and operating public health units in the Parish pursuant to an election held in the Parish on July 21, 2007)(an estimated $620,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for the following revised purposes:  constructing, maintaining and operating public health units in the Parish and paying other General Fund expenditures of the Natchitoches Parish Police Jury; and shall said Police Jury additionally be authorized to rededicate and expend up to $300,000 of unexpended revenues of health unit millages approved at an election held on July 21, 2007 for General Fund expenditures of said Police Jury?

Race.SpecificTitle: Sales Tax District No. 1 -- 1% S&U - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Sales Tax District No. 1 Proposition
(Sales Tax Renewal)

Summary:  Authority for Sales Tax District No. 1 of the Parish of Natchitoches (all of Natchitoches Parish outside of the City of Natchitoches) to continue to levy a 1% sales and use tax for an additional 10 years for the purposes of (i) maintaining and operating a solid waste collection and disposal system for Natchitoches Parish (outside of the City of Natchitoches) and (ii) for the improvement of roads in the Natchitoches Parish road system.
Race.FullText: Shall Sales Tax District No. 1 of the Parish of Natchitoches, State of Louisiana (all of Natchitoches Parish outside of the City of Natchitoches) (the "District"), under the provisions of Article VI, Section 30 of the Louisiana Constitution of 1974, and other constitutional and statutory authority, be authorized to continue to levy and collect a sales and use tax of one percent (1%), for an additional ten (10) years, effective January 1, 2011, in the manner and to the extent provided by La. R.S. 33:2721.6, et seq., and other constitutional and statutory authority (the "Tax") (an estimated $1,830,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), which, after paying the costs of collecting and administering the Tax shall be used for the purposes of (i) maintaining and operating a Solid Waste Collection and Disposal System for Natchitoches Parish (outside of the City of Natchitoches) and (ii) for the improvement of roads in the Natchitoches Parish Road System?

Race.SpecificTitle: Cons. Sch. Dist. No. 7 -- 7 Mills - SB - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Consolidated School District No. 7 Proposition 
(Tax Renewal)

Summary:  10 year, 7 mills tax renewal for the purpose of giving additional aid and support to public elementary and secondary schools in Consolidated School District No. 7 by providing funds for construction, repairs, purchase of equipment and/or supplies and additional improvements.
Race.FullText: Shall Consolidated School District No. 7 of the Parish of Natchitoches, Louisiana (the "District"), continue to levy a special tax of seven (7) mills on all property subject to taxation within the District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2011 and ending with the year 2020 (an estimated $322,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for the purpose of giving additional aid and support to the public elementary and secondary schools in the District by providing funds for construction, repairs, purchase of equipment and/or supplies and additional improvements?
